Jacquin Headen - District 2

Jacquin Headen - District 2
===========================

[Jacquin Headen's Bio](https://www.gptx.org/Government/Mayor-and-City-Council/Jacquin-Headen-District-2#panel-1-1)
[Council District Map](https://www.gptx.org/Government/Mayor-and-City-Council/Jacquin-Headen-District-2#panel-1-2)

Jacquin Headen's Bio
--------------------

Co-pastor, owner of an interior design and art business and negotiation skills teacher
Davidson College
University of Maryland School of Law

Jacquin Headen was elected to represent Grand Prairie’s City Council District 2 in 2022. She has served on the Grand Prairie Library Board and Westchester Public Improvement District Board.

In 2023, Council Member Headen was appointment to serve on the National League of Cities Community and Economic Development Federal Advisory Committee. She was reappointed to the committee in 2025.

Council Member Headen was reappointed to the National League of Cities Council on Youth, Education and Families in 2025.

She is passionate about education and teaches a youth mentoring workshop that encourages young people to think about being business owners early in life. She has also worked as a tutor for middle school and college students and volunteers teaching professional development skills.
